amendment.description: An amendment numbered 171 printed in Part A of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds in the bill from being used to acquire, use, transfer, or sell cluster munitions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 284 (Roll no. 329).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 284 (Roll no. 329).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
